definition: A sweet, edible substance typically made from roasted and ground cacao seeds, often combined with sugar and other ingredients. It is commonly consumed as a treat or used as an ingredient in various desserts and confectionery products.

examples.english: My favorite type of chocolate is dark chocolate.
Chocolate is a popular sweet treat.

examples.german: Ich schenke meiner Freundin Schokolade zum Geburtstag.
examples.english: I give chocolate to my girlfriend for her birthday.
